FT 1-1 out of jail to get a point, referee embarrassment.. Harsh on Betis, incredible performance
@jasonpettigrove don't need tech for that decision.. it's 3 yards over
It's without doubt a disgrace of a decision but Barca have embrassed themselves.. Lucho selection awful from start.. #laliga
Only in #LaLiga this isn't a goal https://t.co/5FnMcNt94M
@KieranCanning you don't need tech for that, it's 3 yards over
Wow Barca score with ball 3 yards over the line and it's not giving.. it's absolutely disgrace of a decision.. #LaLiga
This is sensational.. Betis clear off the line twice in a couple minutes #laliga
Finally Betis take the lead, they have destroyed Barca for 75 minutes.. mistake from a corner, alagria scores.. #LaLiga
@FutbolSergi this is by far the worst performance of the season.. embarrassing
Arda final taking off Messi into midfield.. #laliga
Awful performance from Barca as we hit the hour mark.. Gomes on for Denis.. Barca need something magical here #laliga
And he does it #federer incredible #AusOpen what a match
The greatest of all time @rogerfederer #AusOpen
@BumperGraham best player on the pitch.. Barca poor on the ball and 2 static.. Expect hairdryer treatment at HT
Terrible from Barca, lucky to be level at HT.. passing and movement awful.. Big talk at HT needed #laliga
Finally a chance, Messi puts Neymar in and Adan makes the save.. Should score #LaLiga
Barca have possession nobidy looking for it in the final third.. too static.. Busquets and Iniesta massive miss. #laliga
Dani Cabellos is everywhere.. Super performance from the Betis midfielder.. #laliga
Denis, Arda, Suarez all well off the pace so far.. Really poor on the ball.. Betis well on top #LaLiga
Lucas Digne down injured, he's been really poor on the ball in this opening 16 minutes.. #LaLiga
What a coup that is from Mainz https://t.co/McRDnAY1TG
#federer dominates the third with a 6-1 win.. leads 2-1 #AusOpen #FedererNadal
#federer breaks in third and leads 3-0.. Stunning tennis #AusOpen
Vidal gets a start.. Mathieu starts which is strange.. Arda in midfield.. Rakitic as the DM.. #BetisFCB
Mane penalty was shocking but much needed good news for #LFC and #Klopp he's coming back @fanfeud #AFCON2017
Aboubakar to win it for Cameroon and put them in the semi final... he scores incredibly #AFCON2017
Saido Mane with 5th peno and he misses!!! #AFCON2017
Takeu smashes home 3-3... The quality is excellent compared to the match #AFCON2017

Oyongo scores 2-2 after 2 #AFCON2017
Kara for Senegal and scores, just about.. #AFCON2017
Moukandjo scores for Cameroon 1-1 #AFCON2017
Koulibaly smashes home for Senegal 1-0 #AFCON2017
FT and we have penalties.. Really poor game, no idea how this shootout will go #AFCON2017
Celta impressive 2017 is continuing.. There 2 mins away from another win #LaLiga
3 mins to go until penalties.. Both teams have been poor tonight and lack quality #AFCON2017
And he misses from 5 yards.. Huge chance #AFCON2017
Aboubakar on for Cameroon as we edge closer to HT in ET.. Good player could make a difference #AFCON2017
HT 0-0 Senegal slightly better team but poor game... Not much happening #AFCON2017
Good chance for Mame Diouf but he puts over.. Open game that's lacking quality #AFCON2017
Well that was easy for Eibar... Awful defending from Depor.. #LaLiga

Lovely barca move, recycling the balk from one side to the other.. Vidal with a lovely cross into the back post and Arda taps home 4-2

Wawrinka breaks again and will now serve to stay bring it to final set #AusOpen
